message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects the quality and value of the product while allowing us both to benefit from the transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am only able to pay up to $90 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both of our positions.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your offer. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet at $100. I would like to propose a final offer of $95 for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
